comment.text: This key provides the text for a button or action that deletes a room. It appears within a context menu or similar UI element where users can manage rooms. Translators should ensure the wording accurately conveys the action of removing a room.

usage.context:
: isAIAgent
 ? t("DeleteAgent")
 : item.isTemplate
 ? t("DeleteTemplate")
 : item.isRoom
 ? t("Common:DeleteRoom")
 : t("Common:Delete"),
 icon:
 item.isRoom && !isAIAgent ? RemoveOutlineSvgUrl : TrashReactSvgUrl,
 onClick: () => this.onDelete(item, t),
 disabled: item.isTemplate ? !isTemplateOwner : false,
